node.title: We Evolved
node.excerpt: As I wrote here a long time ago, I used to be associated with a rather well known and widespread religion – The Jehovah's Witnesses.

node.title: Me and Mr Carl
node.excerpt: So, I had a fun night.

node.title: Life is Strange
node.excerpt: Part of the motivation behind leaving my life in the city was the lack of employment, but the main factor was that of family.

node.title: Insane
node.excerpt: Did I ever tell you what the definition of insanity is? Insanity is doing the exact... same thing... over and over again and… expecting a different outcome.

node.title: Can't hold on much longer
node.excerpt: This stinks.

node.title: Absolution
node.excerpt: Train? Bus? Nope. In the party wagon with this guy.

node.title: A Nation of Stags
node.excerpt: And here we go again.

node.title: Life with a Chuwi (Lapbook 12.3)
node.excerpt: I'm back on the bus! But this time I am going to strive to do something productive on the journey.

node.title: At Dawn
node.excerpt: Who knew it was this cold at 5:30 am?

node.title: Current (life) events
node.excerpt: Well, stuff is happening.

node.title: Living in the City (you know you have to survive)
node.excerpt: Well, my life has changed.

node.title: New Zealand Politics 2017
node.excerpt: New Zealand doesn't have a political system like the United States. The head of the country isn't someone you vote for directly. Instead you vote for a political party, and the head of a particular party then becomes the countries leader – or Prime Minister.

node.title: The Nuclear Option
node.excerpt: Nuclear power has always been very controversial, but since the disaster in Japan at the Fukushima Daiichi power plant the topic has come under more scrutiny than ever.

node.title: When Nice Stuff Happens
node.excerpt: Doesn't stuff happen? Nice stuff happens. I like it when nice stuff happens.

node.title: Query the theoretical
node.excerpt: This will be a bit of thinking out loud, a stream of consciousness. It won't have the editorial quality that I'm trying to follow, but some strange force is motivating me to put this out before I sleep. It's just turned 1 am.

node.title: Oh What a Night?
node.excerpt: This is the finish my friend, this is the End.

node.title: It's Business Time
node.excerpt: In my great effort to move forward and get down to business, I got business cards printed.

node.title: Research report into Name of Austin
node.excerpt: What is Austin?

node.title: I have, I want
node.excerpt: First, I built a splash page profile to help expand my reach as I go into this new world of freelance, casual employment.

node.title: Public Spoken
node.excerpt: I did a presentation with the Humanist Society of New Zealand. About 20 people attended, all in a meeting room above a pub in the middle of the city. I'd say it went well, although I'm sure from an outside perspective I was awkwardly squeezing words out of my mouth.
